overview:
Nils joined Seventure Partners in 2008 as analyst working at Seventure’s German office located in Munich. Together with Dr. Krause, he’s scouting and pursuing investment opportunities in the German ICT and internet sector and supports Seventure’s portfolio companies.

Before that, Nils worked for the Spanish internet startup FON.com and the KfW-Endowed Chair in Entrepreneurial Finance (at Technische UniversitÃ¤t MÃ¼nchen).

Nils studied Technology and Management oriented Business Administration at Technische UniversitÃ¤t MÃ¼nchen (Munich, Germany) and Spears School of Business at Oklahoma State University (Stillwater, USA). During his studies he focused on “Entrepreneurial Finance” (private equity, LBOs, venture capital), “Industrial Production & Logistics” (supply chain management, logistic networks and operations, industrial organizations and processes) and Mechanical Engineering (product development strategies, complex systems).

He was member of the board of STARTmunich, the German branch of STARTglobal, an international network for entrepreneurship, and head of strategy & development at PCUmunich, a non-profit organization fostering entrepreneurship.
